traits.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
traits.desc: The githyanki's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components: * At will: mage hand (the hand is invisible) * 3/day each: blur, jump, misty step, nondetection (self only) * 1/day each: plane shift, telekinesis

traits.name: Rally the Troops
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the githyanki can magically end the charmed and frightened conditions on itself and each creature of its choice that it can see within 30 feet of it.
